name: Rachael's Grilled Chicken Cutlets Parmigiana
ingredients: 4 small or 2 large boneless chicken breasts
1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, or to taste
15 ounce can fire roasted diced tomatoes, such as Muir Glen brand *
2 ounces freshly grated parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup
4 ounces smoked mozzarella or fontina cheese, sliced thin *

instructions.en: If using large chicken breasts, cut them in half. Season with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken on an indoor or outdoor grill until just done; keep warm.
In a small pot over low heat, saut√© garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, and onion for 10 minutes, stirring often.
Add undrained tomatoes to the pot and heat through, about 2 minutes.
Add basil to the sauce and heat just until wilted. Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper as needed.
In a baking dish, layer the chicken, sauce, parmesan cheese, and mozzarella or fontina cheese.
Broil until the top is browned, about 1-2 minutes.

notes: * If you can't find fire roasted diced tomatoes or smoked mozzarella, you can use regular canned diced tomatoes and mozzarella cheese. This recipe makes 4 servings. Do not freeze.
